titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the reliefe of the poore sick and maymed souldiers of His Majesties army.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at His Majesties court at Oxford, ths seaventh day of Iuly, in the nineteenth yeare of His Majesties raigne. 1643.
Arms 37; Steele notation: and dy, of.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
